These are sayings/messages that God gave to Agur, the son of Jakeh.
It seems that I am very stupid;
I do not deserve to be considered to be a human;
I do not have the good sense that humans should have.
No one [RHQ] has ascended to heaven
to find out what God is like
No one [RHQ] has gathered/held the wind in his hand.
No one [RHQ] has wrapped the water
and no one [RHQ] has established the boundaries of the earth.
If you know who has done those things, tell me
[RHQ] his name, and the names of his children [SAR]!
But you do not know who has done those things, so you cannot speak with authority about what God is like
Everything that God has said is true;
a shield [MET] for all those who request him to protect them.
Do not add to (OR, change) what God has said;
if you do that, he will rebuke you and show that you are lying.
, I ask you to do two things for me;
Help me never to lie or deceive
and do not cause me to become poor or to become rich.
give me the food that I need;
I might say that I do not [RHQ] know you and that I do not need you;
I might dishonor you by stealing things.
Do not ◄slander/say bad things about► a worker to his boss;
if you do that, the worker will curse you, and cause you to have trouble.
I will list four kinds of evil things that people do
Some people curse their fathers and do not
Some people think that they are perfect,
they have never been cleansed from their guilt for committing disgusting sins.
they think that they are very good and they despise others.
and try to cause them to disappear from the land.
are always wanting more blood to suck
There are four things that are never ◄satisfied/content with what they have►;
The place where the dead people are;
women who do not have any children;
and a fire that always needs more wood.
Those who [SYN] make fun of their fathers
or refuse to obey their mothers (OR, despise their aged mothers)
have their eyes pecked out by crows,
rest of their corpses should be
There are four things that are wonderful to me,
I do not understand any of them:
How eagles fly in the sky,
how ships sail on the seas,
and how a man falls in love with a woman.
This is what a woman who ◄is not faithful to/does not have sex only with► her husband does:
and says, “I have not done anything that is wrong!”

becomes the boss instead of her mistress.
four animals on the earth that are small, but they are very wise:
but they store up food during the summer
in order to have it during the winter
but they make their homes among the rocks
Locusts do not have a king,
you can hold them in your hand,
four animals that strut around and look very impressive while they walk [DOU]:
Lions, which are stronger than all other animals
and are not afraid of any of them;
and kings who ◄parade/walk proudly back and forth► in front of the people whom they rule.
